**Hoarfrost Cannonade** is a level 5 [Ice](/Ice_Magic "Ice Magic")/[Alchemy](/Alchemy "Alchemy") spell that constructs 2 [hoarfrost cannons](/Hoarfrost_cannon "Hoarfrost cannon") near the caster, which are stationary turrets that fire long-range [freezing](/Frozen "Frozen") projectiles each turn.

The cannons lose a portion of their HP with each shot they take. If they last long enough to shoot 5 times, their 5th shot will explode in a 3x3 area for increased damage that ignores allies.

The cannons count as allies, so followers of [Okawaru](/Okawaru "Okawaru") cannot use this spell. When they are destroyed or dismissed for any reason, they will leave behind a pool of [shallow water](/Shallow_water "Shallow water").
